subject: help with test methods
msgSnippet: Hi... I have this method to add a book in library: public void testAddBookOk() { book.setTitleBook( The lord of rings ); library.addBook(book); } And i have
messageBody:
Hi...

I have this method to add a book in library:

public void testAddBookOk() {
book.setTitleBook("The lord of rings");
library.addBook(book);
}

And i have this method to listAllBooks:

public void testListAllBooks() {
testAddBookOk();
books = library.listAllBooks();

assertEquals(books.get(0), "The lord of rings");
}

is correct I to call the method testAddBookOk() in the body of testListAllBooks ?

I call this method to populate the ArrayList.

Regards.
